name: @VSS-CO/Strata
description: Strata Extended - A statically-typed scripting language that compiles to C, JavaScript, and more

scripts.test:examples: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/01_basic_types.str && node dist/main.js examples/02_arithmetic.str && node dist/main.js examples/03_comparison.str && node dist/main.js examples/04_logical.str && node dist/main.js examples/05_unary.str && node dist/main.js examples/06_if_else.str && node dist/main.js examples/07_while_loop.str && node dist/main.js examples/08_for_loop.str && node dist/main.js examples/09_break_continue.str && node dist/main.js examples/10_functions.str
scripts.test:quick: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/01_basic_types.str
scripts.test:all: npm run test:examples && npm run test:type-safety && npm run test:operators && npm run test:control-flow
scripts.test:type-safety: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/15_type_safety.str
scripts.test:operators: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/19_operators_precedence.str
scripts.test:control-flow: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/17_nested_control.str
scripts.test:algorithms: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/18_algorithms.str
scripts.test:immutability: npm run build && node dist/main.js examples/16_immutability.str
scripts.run:hello: npm run build && echo 'import io from str\nio.print("Hello, World!")' > /tmp/hello.str && node dist/main.js /tmp/hello.str
scripts.verify: npm run build && npm run test:quick
scripts.docs:view: open docs.html || start docs.html || xdg-open docs.html
scripts.docs:build: echo 'Documentation is in README.md and ARCHITECTURE.md'
scripts.readme: open README.md || start README.md || xdg-open README.md
scripts.architecture: open ARCHITECTURE.md || start ARCHITECTURE.md || xdg-open ARCHITECTURE.md
scripts.agents: open AGENTS.md || start AGENTS.md || xdg-open AGENTS.md
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.ci: npm run build && npm run test:quick && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.version: npm run build && node dist/main.js --version || echo 'Strata v1.0.0'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test:quick

author: Strata Contributors
